STAGE.Definition: a raised floor or platform on which artists perform

SET THEM ON COURSE.Definition: made it likely for them (to succeed)

COVER SONGS.Definition: songs of other bands or artists

UNTIDY.Definition: showing lack of care, not arranged with care

LEATHER.Definition: material made from the skin of an animal

BEAT.Definition: strong regular repeated pattern of sound, rhythm

WINNING OVER.Definition: making them feel sure about him and support him

STEREOTYPE.Definition: a fixed or set idea people have about something

TIDY UP.Definition: arrange in a orderly and attractive way

TIDY.Definition: orderly and arranged in a nice way

BOWED.Definition: bent or lower the head or upper part of the body as a sign of respect and greeting

BEHIND THE SCENES.Definition: doing things not known to the public

PRIVATE.Definition: a soldier of the lowest rank

UNIFORM.Definition: the special set of clothes that has to be worn by soldiers

FOND OF HIM.Definition: having a liking or love for him

STIMULANTS.Definition: substances that speeds up the body system

SPIRALING.Definition: entering a bad situation fast and continuously

OUT OF CONTROL.Definition: without having control of the situation

VORACIOUS.Definition: having a strong desire for something

GAMBLER.Definition: someone who often played games of luck for money

UNUSUAL.Definition: interesting because he was different from others

IMMACULATELY.Definition: in a perfectly clean and arranged way

LOOKING THE PART.Definition: having the appearance of an important and successful person

END UP.Definition: did it in the end or eventually

AFFECTIONATELY.Definition: in a way that showed love and respect

SUMMED UP.Definition: expressed or described in a few words
